transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello sir.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: I am audible to you sir.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello Namaskar Himanshu ji.
Customer: Haan Namaskar ji.
Executive: Ji abhi main unhi baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji bolo sir bolo.
Executive: Sir aapne negative feedback diya hai sir main usi ke liye call kiya.
Customer: Abhi to abhi to wo shop se mere se tay ye kiya tha tumhare pass aadmi aayenge.
Customer: Aur mere pass recording hai sari maine recording karke rakhi hai jab hamare aadmi aayenge samjhane ke liye yaha pe aayenge aur check lene aaye the mere pass check lene ke liye aaye the inki sabki photo recording hai mere pass.
Executive: Unka recording aap mujhe whatsapp pe bhej dijiye sir.
Customer: Meri shop se koi nahi aaya uske baad bhi.
Executive: Aap sir jo recording hai na aap wo recording mujhe bhej do whatsapp pe sir.
Customer: Main kyu bhejunga aapko.
Executive: Aap sir mujhe bhejiye kam se kam.
Executive: Sir aap bhejoge to kam se kam pata to chalega na ke kisne kaha hai ki sir aapke yaha aadmi aayenge sir.
Customer: Wo to main main apne star se karunga main.
Customer: Bhai wo main apne star se karunga main aapke star se thodi na karunga.
Executive: Kyu nahi sir ofcourse aap hame update karenge na to main bhi to janna chahunga na sir ke kisne kaha tha ki sir aapke yaha aadmi aayenge aur aapko sir update karenge at least aap ye to batayenge na.
Customer: Haan haan mere ko bola hai mere pass recording hai maine pehle mere ko pata hai na ki ye aise kar sakte hai.
Executive: Achha sir wahi recording to sir main mang raha hu na.
Customer: Har 15 din mein aadmi aayega 15 din se chhod ke iske paise liye uske baad.
Executive: Sir bola gaya tha sir ye baat aapko ke har 15 din mein aapko aadmi aayega sir aap mujhe batayenge.
Customer: Haan mere ko bataya tha.
Executive: Kisne sir.
Customer: Jabhi to aaya mere pass main check check lene kaun aaya mere pass.
Customer: Wo check lene aaya to phir hain.
Executive: Jo check lene aaya tha usne sir aapse kaha tha.
Customer: Nahi usne usne kaha wo bhi recording hai phone pe bhi recording hai.
Customer: Mere pass mere pass recording hai.
Executive: Wahi sir person ka to main detail mang raha hu na sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Usi person ka to sir main detail mang raha hu na ki sir aap hame dijiye na ki kis person ne.
Customer: Are aap kaun hote ho mere se detail mangne wale.
Executive: To sir aap aise.
Customer: Aap kaun hote ho.
Executive: Sir main yaha pe sir meri team kaam kar rahi hai aapko call kar rahi hai meri team aapko bilkul sir humne aapko.
Customer: Aapki team ke alawa team kaam nahi kar rahi hai.
Executive: Sir humne aapki.
Customer: Sir humne aapko by lead.
Customer: Main are meri baat suno sir jo bhi aata hai main abki baar main sambhal raha hu sir aapka wo mere se aap sambhalo.
Executive: Sir jo bhi aata hai mujhe nahi pata lekin maine to sir aapko by lead bhi sir team se share karwaya hai sir aapne by lead bhi consume nahi kiya hai sir aapke jo primary.
Customer: Are humne to sir aapke hai sir karte karte saal bhar ho gaye sir kya kare humne dekhna hi band kar diya kya kare bech di humne khub khub by lead dekh dekh ke sab try kar karke humne kuch bhi lena dena hai nahi.
Executive: Sir aap consume hi kaha kar rahe hain hamari team aapko bhej to rahi hai by lead lekin aap by lead consume bhi nahi kar rahe hain aapke sath discussion hua tha to maine kaha ke aapke.
Customer: Are are aap fraud bechte ho to kya karenge batao.
Customer: Wo originality mein wo recording are wo requirement hoti nahi hai originality mein requirement.
Executive: Sir jab aap by lead consume hi nahi kar rahe ho to sir aapko kaise pata ki sir us buyer ka requirement hai ya nahi hai.
Customer: Abhi abhi nahi kar rahe 10-15 din se pehle to 10 mahine se to kar rahe the na hum.
Executive: Sir aap kaha 10 mahine se sir by lead sir aap consume kar rahe hain ye batayiye.
Customer: Nahi are abhi 10 din se 15 din se humne dekhna hi band kar diya maine chhod do isme dimag lagana apne kaam mein dimag lagao na offline mein online mein jo bhi hamara dusre dusri side pe usme dimag lagao ispe kyu dimag lagaye jo aadmi ke pass chalo ji ye to aap bar bar wo kar rahe ho to hum kya kare.
Customer: Hum to wahi denge feedback hamara kaam nahi hoga to hum feedback denge meri jagah meri jagah aap hoge to aap kya doge mere ko ye batao.
Executive: Sir agar aap mere jagah hoge to aap ye batao ke agar main service dene ke liye ready hu aur aap service.
Customer: Use nahi kar rahe ho to waha pe sir main kya kar sakta hu sir.
Customer: Chahiye are phone chahiye mere ko pata hai mere ko mere ko phone chahiye sir.
Executive: Sir sab kya bol rahe hain mujhe nahi pata lekin main ye jaan raha hu ke jab se aap mere se baat kar rahe hain tab se sir maine aapko proper by lead whatsapp pe share karwaya hai aapke person ne use nahi kiya us by lead ko consume nahi kiya to sir batayiye usme hamari kya galti hai.
Customer: Are consume to abhi 10-15 din se nahi kar rahe nahi pehle hum kar rahe the.
Executive: Sir main 10-15 din se handle kar raha hu to usi ki baat karunga na sir ab main 10 mahine piche ja ke sir improve nahi kar sakta sir.
Customer: Usse pehle jo bhi aa raha tha aaji ab main karunga sahab maine sambhala hai sir aap sambhalo to aap sir aap phir aap galat baat kar rahe hain sir literally agar main aapko abhi service de raha hu sir main agar abhi aapko service provide kar raha hu aapko properly team morning mein bhi unko by lead bhej rahi hai aur hum unse connect bhi kar rahe hain ke aap sir consume kijiye sir.
Customer: Chalo chalo consume kar raha hu meri baat suno aap aap mere ko ye bata do mera catalog agar aaj tak sahi kiya hai to mere ko bata do catalog mein.
Executive: Sir aapne jitna jitna product diya us product ko humne update bhi kiya hua hai sir aapse hi maine baat kiya tha na ki sir aap mujhe detail bhejiye.
Customer: Catalog dhang se banai nahi catalog dhang se banai nahi jaise un logo ka yaha pe bana ke leke ja rahe hain log.
Executive: Aap aap sir samajhiyega aap aath mahine pehle ki baat kar rahe hain ke aapka catalog nahi bana hai abhi jab meri team kaam kar rahi hai to aap usme cooperate bhi to nahi kar rahe hain na sir.
Customer: Nahi cooperate to hum to a karne ke liye tayar hai hum to hamare ko business chahiye ke humko business diye lekin ek baat batao kya kare usme dimag ladayenge usme usse kya fayda mere ko batao jab koi kaam hi nahi fayda aayega to.
Executive: Sir dekhiye sir dekhiye aapka business ka jo revenue hai na do se teen din mein bhi sir improve ho jata hai sir agar do buyer aapse genuine connect ho jate hain to right hum aapko properly by lead sir bhej rahe hain lekin aapka person agar jo hai wo by lead consume nahi kar raha hai to sir usme hamari galti nahi hai meri team morning mein aapko by lead bhejti hai sir aapko by lead consume karna chahiye na wo person wo reply tak nahi de rahe hain kaha bhai ispe maine by lead consume kiya buyer deny kar raha hai buyer mana kar raha hai ye tarika nahi hota hai sir.
Customer: Nahi buyer buyer please by lead sir hamari team ne aapko bheja hua hai aur hum proper aapke product light mein search kar aap sir dekhiye.
Customer: Meri baat suno meri baat suno.
Executive: Ji batayiye.
Customer: Mere handicraft ka kaam hai hain bilkul bilkul meri baat suno sir main banata hu lakdi ke pen lakh ke pen wagera ye banata hu hain ab usme usme kaun se kaun se mujhe pen ka order aayega 1 lakh piece mere ko sir aaj chahiye ji kitne ka 5 rupay wala chahiye mere ko ab wo aake to dikha diya 1 lakh piece ki requirement hai lekin wo mang raha hai 5 rupay mein hain.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ab ab 5 rupay wala main plastic wala to wo jo jo jo local use karte hain wo wala banata nahi hu main.
Executive: Nahi sir main samajh gaya aapke product main aapke product se related handcrafted handcraft se related jo aapne yaha pe product dala hua hai jo category mention hai usi pe mera executive jo hai us category ko search karke properly by lead share karta hai jaise aapka jo category hai women cloth ho gaya men cotton shirts ho gaya women co ord set ho gaya aapka suits sarara ho gaya men printed shirt ho gaya hum usme aapko by lead share karte hain girls casual top ho gaya ab dekhiye mera kaam hai sir main piche ki aapki journey sahi nahi kar paunga kyuki sir wo samay beet gaya hai lekin jab se mere pass aapka catalog aaya hai sir ye batayiye maine aapko by lead share kiya hai ki nahi kiya hai sir.
Customer: Lekin lekin sir sir main ek baat bata raha hu kya.
Executive: Aap sir dekhiye meri baat suniye pehle do minute suniye aap jo feedback sir dete hain na wo mere pe count hota hai ab batayiye main kaam karke bhi aap mujhe feedback negative de rahe hain sir ye galat baat hai sir.
Customer: Nahi sab sab yahi bolte hain sir meri baat suno jo bhi aaya na aaj tak wo yahi bolta hai abse pehle ho gaya usko bhul jao ab jo hoga usko bhul jao.
Executive: Nahi sir main main aapko ye nahi kah raha hu ke aap bhul jaiye aap use yaad rakhiye lekin aap ye batayiye ke abhi jo hum aapko share kar rahe hain sir use aap kyu nahi consume kar rahe hain hum aapko proper service de rahe hain na sir aapko by lead provide kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Are wo to ho gaye to ho gaye yaar wo to 15 din mein main kar raha hu.
Customer: Sir aapki aawaz break ho rahi hai.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Aapki sir aawaz break ho rahi hai ha batayiye.
Customer: Haan haan wo wo to meri aawaz suno wo to gadi chala raha tha main.
Customer: To meri baat suno ye hota hai ki sir hum hum to bhi kaam hum bhi kaam ke liye baithe hain ek baat batao humne kaise consume kiye sir ek baat batao.
Executive: Ofcourse sir aap businessman hain sir aap kaam ke liye baithe hue hain ofcourse aap baithe hue hain aap ye batayiye ke main aapka kaam kar raha hu ki nahi kar raha hu sir ye batayiye.
Customer: Nahi paisa humne lagaya nahi lagaya.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know why negative feedback was given.

- Claims IndiaMART promised in-person visits.

- Claims catalog not created properly.

- Claims byleads are not useful.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for recording of promises.

- Executive explained the bylead sharing process.

- Executive stated the team is sending byleads.

- Executive explained how to consume byleads.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive asked customer to share recording.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, byleads, catalog, recording
